title: Schedule Customer Water Meter Replacement
description: A water meter has reached the end of its service life and needs to be replaced.

tasks.description: The asset management system flags a meter that is due for replacement.
tasks.expected_outcome: System automatically generates a replacement work order.

tasks.description: Notify the customer of the upcoming required meter change and provide a scheduling link.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a notification to the customer.

tasks.description: Once scheduled, assign the work order to a field technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: System dispatches the work order for the scheduled date.
